name: Adrihel's Wings
description:
SUBMISSION FOR - My First Game Jam: Winter 2023

Want to play a Third Person Sci-Fi Rougelike where your goal is to survive as long as possible while collecting powerups? Well this is not even close to the level of Risk of Rain so don't get your hopes up.

NOTE: Still need to Tweak many of the values so go crazy?!

CONTROLS:

- WASD : Movement

- LEFT/RIGHT MOUSE : Aim/Shoot
